content: follow your heart and make a potholder for your kitchen this potholder is crocheted in the round in one piece which means that it is double thick and there is no sewing involved the follow your heart potholder uses a combination of half double crochets double crochets and puff stitches to create beautiful columns of hearts > this potholder pattern is part of the ** 2024 potholders galore crochet-along 1 ** and with the purchase of an ebook you will receive a total of 13 potholder patterns one pattern every two weeks during the crochet-along > if you d like to be notified when new potholder patterns are released in the crochet-along you can join the ** 2024 crochet along email list here 2 ** * the free pattern for the follow your heart potholder can be found ** here 3 ** * the complete video tutorial can be found ** here 4 ** * you can learn more about the potholders galore crochet along ** here 5 ** skill level intermediate language english crochet terminology us terms crochet stitch chain slip_stitch half_double_crochet double_crochet puff sizes this potholder measures 8 x 8 but instructions are provided to customize the size of your potholder > materials * 4 0mm crochet hook needed * any medium 4 worsted weight 100% cotton yarn * scissors * yarn needle * 2 stitch markers or safety pins > yardage * 180 yds / 165 m > yarn note 100% cotton or wool yarn is recommended for potholders because they don t burn under extreme heat cotton blends and other fibers like acrylic should not be used i hope you enjoy making your potholders 1 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/potholders-galore-crochet-along-2024 2 https //thispixiecreates myflodesk com/pgcal 3 https //thispixiecreates com/puff-stitch-heart-potholder/ 4 https //youtu be/s_mqgxaprly 5 https //thispixiecreates com/2024-potholder-crochet-along/
